results.title: Gastroprotective effects of nebivolol and simvastatin against cold restraint stress-induced gastric ulcer in rats
results.text_hl: Gastroprotective effects of @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against cold restraint stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcer@@@ in rats

results.title: Gastric antisecretory and antiulcer effects of simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: The effect of orally administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ was also studied on @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@- and @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcers@@@.

citations.NLM: Tariq M, Khan HA, Elfaki I, Arshaduddin M, Al Moutaery M, Al Rayes H, Al Swailam R. Gastric antisecretory and antiulcer effects of simvastatin in rats. J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2007 Dec;22(12):2316-23. PMID: 17593225

results.title: Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins.
results.text_hl: This study investigated the possible mechanisms underlying the gastroprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcer@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Heeba GH, Hassan MK, Amin RS. Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins. Eur J Pharmacol. 2009 Apr 1;607(1-3):188-93. PMID: 19217901

results.title: Protective Effects of Simvastatin Against Alendronate-Induced Gastric Mucosal Injury in Rats.
results.text_hl: AIM: This study investigated the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for the treatment of @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcers@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Role of modulation of vascular endothelial growth factor and tumor necrosis factor-alpha in gastric ulcer healing in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: A significant difference in @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013276 @@@gastric ulcer@@@ area as well as in gastric @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, @GENE_VEGFA @GENE_83785 @@@VEGF@@@ and @GENE_VWF @GENE_116669 @@@vWF@@@ levels could be observed between @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that received combinations of insulin and @CHEMICAL_Pentoxifylline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010431 @@@pentoxifylline@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ compared to @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that received either drug alone.

citations.NLM: Baraka AM, Guemei A, Gawad HA. Role of modulation of vascular endothelial growth factor and tumor necrosis factor-alpha in gastric ulcer healing in diabetic rats. Biochem Pharmacol. 2010 Jun 1;79(11):1634-9. PMID: 20144589
